Quality Matters

Pre-loading and Loading
Quality Control
Visual Control

  • Product inspection
  • Container control status
  • Item count per container row
  • Label control (for exporter/importer)
  • Packaging control
  • Product defrost in order to assess several parameters

Weight and Size Control

  • Cargo and packaging weight
  • Size sampling
  • Gross and net weight control

Temperature Control

  • Goods temperature control during the entire loading process

Final Report Including Weight Chart,
Temperature Scales and Photos

Records & documents

  • Preparation of documents according to clients needs and requirements
  • Draft check prior issuance of the original documents
  • Issuance of mandatory certificates according to country of destination e.g. ECTN, BSC, BESC, FERI, CNCA and CCVO among others
  • Original documents sent by Courier

Quality Matters

  • Daily cargo tracking
  • Shipment arrival date update
  • Post arrival follow-up in order to avoid over-stays and extra cost at the destination port
